frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose, content, and recent changes for the Jay Sports project.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Jay Sports React app, including SEO meta tags, Open Graph and Twitter Card tags, canonical URL, Google Analytics 4 script, and faviconâ€”all referencing www.jaysports.in.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders only the Home page as the sole route of the application.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying brand story text, an animated stats grid (years, products, athletes, quality), and a 4-column core values grid with Lucide icons.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with store address, phone, email, and business hours, plus a validated contact form that shows a success state upon submission.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with the Jay Sports logo image, smooth-scroll section links with active highlighting, and a responsive hamburger mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card component with a hover 'Find in Store' overlay that opens a modal directing users to the physical store via a Google Maps link at hardcoded coordinates.
Renders a grid of six sports product cards (jerseys, shorts, bat, shoes, cap, socks) with prices and badges in a styled section using the ProductCard component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Barlow fonts and Tailwind directives, defining CSS custom properties for brand colors, and declaring reusable component utility classes (cta-primary, cta-secondary, nav-link, product-card).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the DOM root.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Defines the full Home page layout, including a hero section with CTA buttons and stats, and composes Navigation, ProductShowcase, AboutSection, ContactSection, and Footer components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with brand color tokens (oklch), Barlow heading/body fonts, a brand glow shadow, and fade-up/slide-in keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata and feature state for the Jay Sports site, currently recording a pending task to replace the old domain 'jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz' with 'www.jaysports.in' across all frontend files.
